member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.EmbossEffect
member.summary: Creates a grayscale version of an image that appears as though it has been stamped into paper.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Emboss effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.EmbossEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the EmbossEffect class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.EmbossEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for Emboss effect.
member.remarks: This property is initialized to null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.EmbossEffect.Amount
member.summary: Controls the strength of the embossing effect. Default value 1, range 0 to 10.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.EmbossEffect.Angle
member.summary: Specifies the light direction used to create the effect. Units are specified in radians. Default value 0, range 0 to 2*pi.
